variables.input:
fetch bizevents, scanLimitGBytes:-1
| limit 10000000
| filter matchesPhrase(event.provider,
"TGIF_Demo"
)
| fields event.provider
| dedup event.provider

fetch bizevents
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| fields orderId
| limit 10000000

0.title: All My BizEvents

1.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and matchesPhrase(step,"1") or matchesPhrase(step, "2")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if(matchesPhrase(step,"1"), 1, else:0)
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if(matchesPhrase(step, "2"),1, else:0)
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeLast(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeLast(NextStep)}, by:{orderId}
| fieldsAdd Total = ( OriginStep_ts)
| summarize Total = sum(Total)

2.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and (step == "2" or step == "3")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if(matchesPhrase(step,"2"), 1, else:0)
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if(matchesPhrase(step, "3"),1, else:0)
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeLast(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeLast(NextStep)}, by:{orderId}
| fieldsAdd Total = ( OriginStep_ts - NextStep_ts)
| summarize Total = sum(Total)

3.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "3")
| sort timestamp asc
| dedup customerId
| summarize `Total` = count()

4.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "4")
| sort timestamp asc
| dedup customerId
| summarize `Total` = count()

5.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "5")
| sort timestamp asc
| dedup customerId
| summarize `Total` = count()

8.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and (step == "1" or step == "2")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if((step == "1"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if((step == "2"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeFirst(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeFirst(NextStep)}, by:{orderId}
| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)
| summarize minutes = round(avg(JeopardyCheck),decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "✅" , else:"❌")

9.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and (step == "2" or step == "3")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if((step == "2"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if((step == "3"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeFirst(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeFirst(NextStep)}, by:{orderId}
| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)
| summarize minutes = round(avg(JeopardyCheck),decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "✅" , else:"❌")

10.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)

| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)

| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "✅" , else:"❌")

| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)

12.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "1")
| filter isNotNull(error)
| sort timestamp asc
| summarize `Step` = count(),by:{error, event.type}

63.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| limit 1000000
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "1")
| summarize Error_Percentage=round(toDouble(countIf(isnotnull(error)))/toDouble(Count()) * 100,decimals:2)
| fields Error_Percentage, alias:Percent

75.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector and (step == "5")
| fieldsAdd OriginStep = if((step == "5"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| fieldsAdd NextStep = if(matchesPhrase(step, "5"), toTimestamp(timestamp))
| summarize {OriginStep_ts = takeFirst(OriginStep), NextStep_ts = takeFirst(NextStep)}, by:{orderId}
| fieldsAdd JeopardyCheck = toLong((NextStep_ts - OriginStep_ts)/(1000000000.0)/60)
| summarize minutes = round(avg(JeopardyCheck),decimals:2)
| fieldsAdd sla = if(minutes <= 10 , "✅" , else:"❌")

76.query:

| filter matchesPhrase(step, "3")
| filter isNotNull(error) and error != true
| sort timestamp asc
| summarize `Step` = count(),by:{error, event.type}

139.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId

| fieldsAdd OperationsCost = toDouble("30")
| fieldsAdd `Operations Cost` = (MTTR * OperationsCost)

150.query:
fetch bizevents
| filter in(orderId, $OrderID)
| filter event.provider == $Sector
| dedup customerId
| filter matchesPhrase(step, "1")
| fields MTTR, MTTD, MTTI, incidentNumber, event.type, OperationsCost
| summarize MTTR = sum(MTTR)
| fieldsAdd OperationsCost = toDouble("30")
| fieldsAdd `Operating Costs` = (MTTR * OperationsCost)
| fieldsadd CostSaved = (`Operating Costs`/100)*10
| fields `Autoremediation Opportunity - 90% Reduction` = (`Operating Costs` - CostSaved)
//| fieldsAdd `Autoremediation Opportunity` =  (OperationsCost - Autoremediation)
